content:
ToolTipIcon Enum

Definition

Defines a set of standardized icons that can be associated with a ToolTip.

In this Article

public enum ToolTipIcon
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ToolTipIcon

Remarks

The ToolTipIcon enumeration defines a small set of standardized icons that can be displayed as part of a ToolTip. This is accomplished by setting the ToolTipIcon property of the ToolTip class to one of the following values.

Fields

Error

An error icon
Info

An information icon.
None

Not a standard icon.
Warning

A warning icon.
